title: Someone was able to Log into my account and purposely got me banned!
body:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/204329123
If you Look carefully at the match history, I was mostly playing Azir and Veigar in Normals and mostly doing customs.
The 2 new games you see here are Twitch and Viktor game.
I have never used any racist slurs in League of legends in my entire life.
This is what was the game chat in those games was about.

If you look carefully at the chat it was purposely made to get someone banned. I've notice this scripts too.
y^4 +x^4 = xy  which is probably the program used to auto insult.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2610764061/204329123?tab=overview
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2610725402/204329123?tab=overview

If you look carefully at the match history its premade of the same 5 people that those matches occurs.

I have never shared my account with anyone in my entire life. It's been 3 years since I've played league and I don't want this account to get suspended for no Reason. Please Riot do something about this.
**
HE DISENCHANTED MY STAR GUARDIAN AHRI SKIN.
**
I have been saving for soo long to get this skin please Riot save my account....


-------------------------------------------

replies.body:
Anytime you think your account might be compromised or hacked, your best bet is to shoot our account agents a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap. They'll be able to verify you as the account creator and help you out with getting the account back.

FYI, I've edited out your conversations for being overly offensive. Regardless of who it was that actually said these things please do not post overly offensive things here, just as you wouldn't in-game.
this is actually real she is in a discord server and has never done this before
